actions.componentDescription: Google Drive is a file storage and synchronization service developed by Google. Google Drive allows users to store files in the cloud, synchronize files across devices, and share files.
actions.description: Uploads a file to google drive.
actions.name: uploadFile

properties.description: The object property which contains a reference to the file to upload.
properties.name: fileEntry
properties.label: File

properties.description: The id of a folder where the file is uploaded.
properties.name: driveId
properties.label: Folder

properties.description: Whether to ignore the domain's default visibility settings for the created file. Domain administrators can choose to make all uploaded files visible to the domain by default; this parameter bypasses that behavior for the request. Permissions are still inherited from arent folders.
properties.name: ignoreDefaultVisibility
properties.label: Ignore default visibility

properties.description: Whether to set the 'keepForever' field in the new head revision. This is only applicable to files with binary content in Google Drive. Only 200 revisions for the file can be kept forever. If the limit is reached, try deleting pinned revisions.
properties.name: keepRevisionForever
properties.label: Keep revision forever

properties.description: A language hint for OCR processing during image import (ISO 639-1 code).
properties.name: ocrLanguage
properties.label: OCR Language

properties.description: Whether the requesting application supports both My Drives and shared drives.
properties.name: supportsAllDrives
properties.label: Supports all drives

properties.description: Whether to use the uploaded content as indexable text.
properties.name: useContentAsIndexableText
properties.label: Use content as indexable text

properties.description: Specifies which additional view's permissions to include in the response. Only 'published' is supported.
properties.name: includePermissionsForView
properties.label: Include permissions for view

properties.description: A comma-separated list of IDs of labels to include in the labelInfo part of the response.
properties.name: includeLabels
properties.label: Include labels

actions.title: Upload file

actions.componentDescription: Google Drive is a file storage and synchronization service developed by Google. Google Drive allows users to store files in the cloud, synchronize files across devices, and share files.
actions.description: Read a selected file from google drive file.
actions.name: readFile

properties.description: The id of a file to read.
properties.name: fileId
properties.label: File

properties.description: Whether the user is acknowledging the risk of downloading known malware or other abusive files. This is only applicable when alt=media.
properties.name: acknowledgeAbuse
properties.label: Acknowledge abuse

properties.description: Whether the requesting application supports both My Drives and shared drives.
properties.name: supportsAllDrives
properties.label: Supports all drives

properties.description: Specifies which additional view's permissions to include in the response. Only 'published' is supported.
properties.name: includePermissionsForView
properties.label: Include permissions for view

properties.description: A comma-separated list of IDs of labels to include in the labelInfo part of the response.
properties.name: includeLabels
properties.label: Include labels

actions.title: Read file
